name: Prometheus OS
description:
Play as a hacker detective trying to uncover the truth behind a mysterious crime that took place years ago using the specialized operating system, Prometheus OS.

Prometheus OS is a puzzle detective game where you use the eponymous terminal-based operating system to access hidden police data and figure out the mystery behind their cover up. Use your logic and skills to find data and decrypt scrambled text using the built in tools.

The game tests your logic by letting you connect the pieces on your own, and uncover the story bit by bit.

The game features multiple chapters that will be released sequentially.
